explains: adj. 人种志的；民族志学的

sentences.en: Fortunately, he had largely completed assembling the ethnographic material.
sentences.cn: 幸运的是，他大体完成了收集民族志材料的工作。

sentences.en: Ethnographic field studies, focus groups, diary studies, surveys, data mining or analytics.
sentences.cn: 人种学现场研究，焦点小组，日记研究，调查问卷，数据发掘和分析。

sentences.en: Many ethnographic field studies attempt to do this, though there are always some observation biases.
sentences.cn: 很多人种学实地研究致力于此，但是依旧总是出现一些观测偏差。
